logTemplate:
<%*
if (log.mode == "WORK") {
  if (!log.finished) {
    tR = `🟡 Focused ${log.task.name} ${log.duration} / ${log.session} minutes`;
  } else {
    tR = `🍅 Focused ${log.task.name} ${log.duration} minutes`;
  }
} else {
  tR = `☕️ Took a break from ${log.begin.format("HH:mm")} to ${log.end.format(
    "HH:mm"
  )}`;
}
%>
